pages.text: $(li)Seagulls are white birds that will not hesitate to steal food laying on the ground or from you directly.$(br)$(li)If you have a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/buried_treasure_map)Buried Treasure Map$(/l) in your offhand slot and give a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/lobster_tail)Lobster Tail$(/l) to a Seagull, it will fly towards the spot the chest is buried and stand/sit directly above it.
